alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Northern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 5:28AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OTSEGO...STEUBEN... CHEMUNG...CHENANGO...TIOGA...BROOME...DELAWARE...SUSQUEHANNA... NORTHERN WAYNE...AND BRADFORD COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. A quick inch of snow will also accumulate, leading to untreated surfaces and roads becoming snow covered and slippery. Plan some extra time to reach your destination early this morning. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 526 AM EST, an area of heavy snow was along a line extending from Stamford to Sidney Center to Sanitaria Springs to Endwell to near Tioga Center to Pine City to near Troupsburg and moving south at 15 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Chemung, Binghamton, Elmira, Vestal, Johnson City, Oneonta, Endicott, Corning, Southport, and Barton. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 7. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 47 and 84. Interstate 88 between 1 and 16. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 near 230. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
